name: Mastery Talisman: The Elements Entwined
description:
After either side's characters take Elemental Reaction DMG: Obtain 1 Entwinement.
When Entwinement reaches 6: You win the match.
descriptionraw: \n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After either side's characters take Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> Obtain 1 Entwinement.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Entwinement reaches 6:</color> You win the match.
